aspguidp.service.core.atom.impl

Class SimpleAtom

  • java.lang.Object
    • aspguidp.service.core.atom.impl.SimpleAtom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Atom

    public class SimpleAtom
extends java.lang.Object
implements Atom
    Basic implementation of the Atom interface which allows the creation of an atom instance by a raw predicate name and a raw list of arguments.

    Additionally, this class provides a static method to create an atom instance from the string representation of an atom.

    • Constructor Summary

        Create a new atom instance from the string representation of an atom.
        Parameters:
        stringRepresentation - string representation from which the atom is extracted
        Returns:
        atom instance for the given string representation of an atom
        Throws:
        InvalidAtomRepresentationException - if the given string representation is not a valid atom string representation
